title: Font recognize
content:
Hi I have search all over the internet whith no results, I have also many font packs but nothing about this font if you have any info it will be apreciate! Thanks

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [DeAlba.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201094102/http:/typophile.com/files/DeAlba.jpg) | 39.79 KB |

 [‹ Is this orator font ?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201094102/http:/www.typophile.com/node/48827 "Go to previous forum topic") [Spaghetti Brand ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201094102/http:/www.typophile.com/node/48752 "Go to next forum topic")
author: AHMED_SALEME

comments.content:
[Brighton Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201094102/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=brighton), by Alan Bright, according to my old Letraset book.

Extended a bit and with the cut in the A added.
Thank you Richard let me try that one!
